attributes.action: Immediately cut the Fuel Tax by at least 30p a litre
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The main basis of the daily rise in the cost of living is the current fuel prices.  If the fuel tax is cut by at least 30p a litre immediately food prices will follow as supppliers burden will have been eased considerably.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
